twitchSubscriptionStreamerNotFound: {{REDCROSS}} Sorry, I could not find the streamer. Are you sure you wrote their name correctly?
twitchSubscriptionInvalidStatus: {{REDCROSS}} Woah there! I expected "online" or "offline", but I cannot understand what you gave me instead.
twitchSubscriptionAddDuplicated: {{REDCROSS}} You're already subscribed to that streamer in this channel for that status.
twitchSubscriptionAddSuccessOffline: {{GREENTICK}} Success! Whenever {{name}} goes offline, I will post a new message in {{channel}}.
twitchSubscriptionAddSuccessLive: {{GREENTICK}} Success! Whenever {{name}} goes live, I will post a new message in {{channel}}.
twitchSubscriptionAddMessageForOfflineRe: {{REDCROSS}} I'm sorry but it is required to provide a message when making an offline subscription.
twitchSubscriptionRemoveOrResetEmpty: {{REDCROSS}} I'm sorry but you are not subscribed to any streamers, mission abort!
twitchSubscriptionRemoveStreamerNotSubsc: {{REDCROSS}} I'm sorry, you cannot unsubscribe from {{streamer}} because you are not subscribed to them.
twitchSubscriptionRemoveNotToProvidedCha: {{REDCROSS}} I'm sorry; while you're subscribed to this streamer and streaming status, their subscriptions is not posted to {{channel}}.
twitchSubscriptionRemoveStreamerStatusNo: {{REDCROSS} I'm sorry, but it looks like you're not getting {{status}} notifications for {{streamer}}. We support "online" and "offline" notifications.
twitchSubscriptionRemoveSuccessOffline: {{GREENTICK}} Success! I will no longer post messages to {{channel}} whenever {{name}} goes offline.
twitchSubscriptionRemoveSuccessLive: {{GREENTICK}} Success! I will no longer post messages to {{channel}} whenever {{name}} goes live.
twitchSubscriptionResetSuccess_one: {{GREENTICK}} Success! {{count}} subscription has been removed from this server.
twitchSubscriptionResetSuccess_other: {{GREENTICK}} Success! {{count}} subscriptions have been removed from this server.
twitchSubscriptionShowStreamerNotSubscri: {{REDCROSS}} You wanted to see all subscriptions from this streamer, but there are none!
twitchSubscriptionDescription: 管理您的服务器的订阅。

twitchSubscriptionExtended.extendedHelp:
管理此服务器的订阅。
__Online Notifications_
所有可用数据都会出现在非常好的嵌入中，告诉您准确的流到哪里。

__离线通知__
您需要写您自己的消息，在串流离线时会被发布。 它将显示在一个漂亮的Twitch-purple MessageEmbed中。
explainedUsage:
Whether to
　- Add a new Twitch subscription.
　- Remove an existing Twitch subscription
　- Reset all twitch subscription, or those for a specific streamer
　- Show all current Twitch subscriptions
流的 Twitch 用户名获取通知。
一个Discord频道在哪里发布通知。
Twitch 串流应该获得通知的状态，在线或离线通知。
要在 Discord 聊天中发送的消息。离线通知所需，可在线通知。
examples: 添加 favigna #twitch 离线Favna 现已离线。说吧：waving_hand:！
